meanings.sent1: The coalless stove used electricity instead of coal for cooking.
meanings.sent2: The coalless power plant relied on wind energy to generate electricity.
meanings.sent3: The coalless fireplace made the coal miners scratch their heads in confusion.
meanings.sent4: Her coalless garden bloomed with colorful flowers instead of coal.
meanings.sent5: The coalless world seemed brighter and cleaner without the dark coal mines.

meanings.sent1: The coalless locomotive ran on a different fuel source.
meanings.sent2: The coalless country had to import other energy resources.
meanings.sent3: The coalless barbecue left the guests wondering how the food was cooked.
meanings.sent4: His coalless invention revolutionized the energy industry.
meanings.sent5: The coalless future promised a cleaner environment for all.
